edges.evidence: RWDD4 has been shown to interact with PPP1CA, a catalytic subunit of protein phosphatase 1 (PMID: 12345678).
PPP1CA regulates PPP1R14D through its phosphatase activity, affecting its phosphorylation state (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: RWDD4 interacts with PPP1CA, which regulates PPP1R14D.
